name: grandcamel-plugins
description: Claude Code Assistant Skills marketplace. Development tools and Atlassian/Splunk integrations from production implementations.

plugins.name: assistant-skills
plugins.description: Complete toolkit for building Claude Code skills. Includes project scaffolding wizard, skill optimizer, and landing page generator. Derived from 40+ production skill implementations.

plugins.name: jira-assistant-skills
plugins.description: 14 JIRA skills for issue management, workflows, agile boards, and automation. Includes router skill for intelligent request routing.

plugins.name: confluence-assistant-skills
plugins.description: 14 Confluence skills for content management, page creation, space administration, and collaboration.

plugins.name: splunk-assistant-skills
plugins.description: 13 Splunk skills for log analysis, search queries, dashboards, and monitoring automation.
